description: Aspose.Tasks is a class library for working with Microsoft Project files. Using Aspose.Tasks for .NET you can work with MPP, MPT, XML, XLSX, HTML, PDF, XAML and other formats in your applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

Features

TASKS-33767 	Implement SF links rendering
TASKS-33762 	Implement manual column rendering as Task Mode with indicator
TASKS-33746 	Implement field aliases rendering when saving project views
TASKS-33770 	TASKS-33756 Implement original label format rendering for timescale tiers.
TASKS-33769 	TASKS-33756 Implement Gantt Chart timescale tiers rendering for weeks-years and days.
TASKS-33744 	TASKS-33661 Add Inactive milestone, inactive summary and manual summary roll up rendering to GanttChart and page legend
TASKS-33740 	TASKS-33661 Add start/finish/duration only to page legend
TASKS-33739 	TASKS-33661 Add task splits rendering to GanttChart and page legend
TASKS-33738 	TASKS-33661 Add external tasks rendering in GanttChart and page legend
TASKS-33737 	TASKS-33661 Add project info to legend
 
Enhancements

TASKS-33765 	Retain the text color while MPP -> PDF conversion
TASKS-33756 	Use source MPP GantChart TimeScale information for rendering to PDF
TASKS-33755 	Inherit Date/Time format from source MPP to PDF
TASKS-33745 	Render all the coumns as per source MPP: Provide support for TaskUsage and ResourceUsage
TASKS-33731 	Provision of Rendering Extra Resource Information while rendering MPP
TASKS-33698 	Saving Project Data to multiple PDF files
TASKS-33661 	MPP->PDF, Footer section does not contain all symbols as compared to PDF generated by MSP

Bug fixes

TASKS-33774 	ResourceAssignment.setWork raises exception
TASKS-33766 	UID differ while conversion from MPP -> PDF
TASKS-33764 	Columns from source MPP are not retained in output PDF
TASKS-33763 	MPP->PDF generates blank output
TASKS-33759 	Link arrows with negative lags missing between task in Gantt Chart
TASKS-33754 	Tasks from MPP cannot be read
TASKS-33751 	TasksReadingException exception raised while opening the MPP
TASKS-33741 	Actual Start/Finish not updated for parent tasks
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
